New Records: Tristan da Silva scored a career-high 25 points
Key Match Events: Orlando made 9 of 14 from 3-point range in the first quarter, tying the franchise record for 3s in a quarter
Jalen Suggs was injured in the second quarter due to back spasms
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando shot 19 for 44 from 3-point range, improving to 18-6 this season when making 10 or more from distance
The Magic are 3-9 when they make nine or fewer 3s
Others: Orlando hosts Utah on Sunday night. Toronto hosts Milwaukee on Monday night
